#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define MAX 10005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;
 
int main ()
{
	int t;
	LL n;
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sl(n);
		if(n%2==0 & n!=0)
		{
			printf("Yes\n");
		}
		else
		{
			printf("No\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
